remarks: The constructed partial vector space A for a lattice ` K ` is a left vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvalvec.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvalvec.v $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvalvec $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> U e. LVec ) $.
